document_data.Relationships: [[Elthaulin]] believed Neaveil and [[Oprion Blackstone]] were more loyal to him than to [[Fzoul Chembryl]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, while Fzoul Chembryl prepared for the final assault of [[Shandril Shessair]] at the [[Citadel of the Raven]], Elthaulin called upon Oprion and Neaveil, telling them to assemble all underpriests whose loyalty was to him rather than Fzoul.
